name: Gardener the Ripper
description:
The game is a gardener's life, his daily task is to kill evil radishes that attack cabbage. Your job is to protect and grow cabbage. Shoot them with your shells and dodge the pack of enemies.

Walk around the spacious garden, killing evil radishes in it with bullets and try not to get to them for dinner.

Features:
  • Convenient operation
  • Dynamic gameplay
